EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Kevlar® Cutting Machining and Sawing Guide
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® Cutting Machining and Sawing Guide
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Cutting and Machining Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
Below is the web address for the Kevlar® Cutting and Machining Guide. This guide provides product information and technical information on cutting and machining Kevlar®. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/H-62647-11_Machining_Cutting_Drilling_Sawing_KEVLAR.pdf
http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/H-62647-12_Machining_SpecialCutting_Finishing_KEVLAR.pdf
Please let us know if you have additional questions.
DuPont Protection Solutions
